text: == Events == === By place === ==== Europe ==== * October 21 - Benedict IX replaces John XIX, as the 145th pope. * The first mention of the city of Kursk. == Births == * February 16 - Emperor Yingzong of China (d. 1067) * King Vratislav II of Bohemia (d. 1092) * Cheng Hao, Song Dynasty China Neo- Confucian philosopher (d. 1085) == Deaths == * October - Pope John XIX * Bezprym, duke of Poland (murdered) == References ==
